name: Paul Ryan
summary: Former Speaker of the House and 2012 Republican vice presidential nominee who retired rather than work with Trump and later called Trump 'unfit for office.'

keyStatements.quote: If we Republicans have to lose the White House for a generation, so be it, because the alternative is suicide for the party and for the country.
I'll be clear: It's not just his tenor, his tone. The man doesn't know how to tell the truth. He will say anything at any time, regardless of the facts.
